description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Sudoku for everyone. Single player version of Sudoku done in 3D. Allows tracking 10 thousand games for Easy, Medium, Difficult. Multiple Options for rendering, graphics cube textures, and models.  No hard solving methods are used. Just regular Sudoku.
description.short: Sudoku for everyone. Single player version of Sudoku done in 3D. Allows tracking 10 thousand games for Easy, Medium, Difficult. Multiple Options for rendering, graphics cube textures, and models.  No hard solving methods are used. Just regular Sudoku.
